(thank you very much!).  Adjust padding on Lollipop devices.  Allow
installation from Google Play on non-touchscreen devices.

bar and in recents (Lollipop).  Fix checkbox behavior in ImportActivity.

title: Notepad 2.0
message:
Notepad 2.0

Heavily rewritten app to use fragments extensively.  Added dual-pane
view for tablets in landscape mode.  Also includes receiver for Android
Wear plugin (not open-source).

using the keyboard shortcut; various micro-optimizations; update README.
